Test.NotExecuting: This config is not being tested.

ConfigRef.Missing: One or more referenced configs are missing.

NewConfigNotVisible.Message: New config created but not visible.
NewConfigNotVisible.Description: Your config doesn't match the current filter settings so it is not visible in the list.

ControllerAutoBindSuccessful.Title: Great news!
ControllerAutoBindSuccessful.Description: We've updated your project to work with ‘{{controllerName}}’ — everything’s ready to go!

ControllerManualBindRequired.Title: Your input is needed!
ControllerManualBindRequired.Description: {{controllerName}} used in this profile requires manual binding to make your project work correctly.

SimStopped.Title: Flight Simulator Closed
SimStopped.Description: The Flight Simulator has been closed. Execution of config has been stopped. Restart your flight simulator to restart config.
